channel.title: Homepage on Wobbly Earth
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Wobbly Earth

item.title: Your academic homepage: outreach booster or narcissistic outlet?
item.description:
Do you really need an academic homepage?

Considering the abundance of academic homepages and blogs around, I’m certainly not the only one who asked himself that question. I’ve been playing with the idea of making one myself for a quite a while now, and finally decided to give it a shot.
